text: Plassey (now Palasi) is a town in West Bengal, India It can also refer to: * Battle of Plassey, fought there in 1757 during the Seven Years War * Plassey railway station, a stop near the town/Palasi on Indian Railways * Plassey College, a general degree college in Palasi * Plassey, County Clare, the estate of Robert Clive, victor of the battle * Plassey, County Limerick, also named for the battle * MV Plassey, a freighter named for the locations in Ireland ==See also== Plessey (disambiguation)
title: Plassey (disambiguation)
